PEMCO CORPORATION

5601 EASTERN AVENUE
BALTIMORE 24, MARYLAND

Finishing materials produced by Pemco
are applied by other manufacturers and
are found in homes throughout the world.
Pemco Porcelin Enamels give a protec-
tive finish to major appliances, archi-
tectural panels and other metal products.
Pemco Glazes are found on dinnerware,
sanitaryware, wall tile, and Pemco Colors
are found on milk and beverage bottles
and other glass containers.

Map Location G-10















































THE BUCK GLASS CO.
FORT AVENUE and LAWRENCE ST.
Originator of the SQUARE Milk Bottle

Manufacturers of high quality
GLASS CONTAINERS
for dairy, carbonated beverage, food
and allied industries.

A Half Century of Progressive Service

Groups including classes of school children
and teachers are invited to visit our plant.

Map Location F-11











From the Campbell plants and quar-
ries come rock, sand, gravel, Ready-
Mix Concrete and calcite products for
use throughout the -United States in
construction, industry, agriculture
and the home.

HARRY T. CAMPBELL SONS’
CORPORATION

TOWSON, MARYLAND
Map Location F-2

Western Electric Company




Closures - Containers

Noxzema Chemical Company - Point Breeze Works

The Point Breeze Works is one of 15
manufacturing plants of the Western
Electric Company, the manufacturing and
supply unit of the Bell Telephone System.
In the Baltimore plant telephone cable,
rubber and plastic covered wire, tele-
phone cords and plugs, cable’ terminals
and telephone protective apparatus are
manufactured for the telephone industry.





Machines for better packaging.
CROWN CORK & SEAL
COMPANY, INC.

EASTERN AVE. and KRESSON ST.
Map Location 1-10















A Business Romance Since 1917"
The fame of Noxzema products for
skin care has spread throughout the
United States and Canada — then to

the far corners of the world.

Map Location E-7

Sanitary Corporation
